semantic_identifier: 158: feat: Admin UI for segment/ICP weighting: RBAC, validation, versioning, and audit trail

sections.text:
## Description

Implements admin-configurable segment/ICP weighting controls end-to-end so Product/Support can adjust scoring influence without code changes.

Changes included:
- Admin Settings UI
  - Added a new "Scoring → Segment/ICP Weighting" settings page.
  - Displays current weights from the scoring service, editable inputs with inline help.
  - Added "Save" and "Reset to defaults" actions.

- Role-based access control
  - UI route/entry point gated to allowed roles (Admin and PM).
  - Backend authorization enforced on read/write endpoints to prevent bypass via direct API calls.

- Validation + guardrails
  - Server-side schema validation for all weight fields (type/required) and enforced min/max ranges.
  - Rejects extreme/invalid values with user-friendly error messages surfaced in the UI.
  - Reset-to-default uses service-provided defaults to avoid drift.

- Versioning and auditability
  - Weight updates are written as versioned configuration (monotonic revision + timestamps + actor).
  - Each change appends a score audit trail entry capturing: previous values, new values, revision, and user identity, so downstream priority shifts can be traced.

Operational notes:
- Changes take effect immediately for new scoring runs; historical scores remain unchanged but can be explained via the recorded configuration revision in the audit trail.
- Only Admin/PM users can access and modify these settings; other roles receive a forbidden response.

## How Has This Been Tested?

staging
